mapper.select: SELECT group_id AS groupeId, f_get_app_cate_name (group_id) AS groupeName, group_sort FROM home_recommend_hot WHERE dealer_id =#{dealerId} GROUP BY group_id

SELECT `id`, `dealer_id`, `rci_name`, `image_id`, `go_type`, `go_id`, `go_name`, `state`, `creator_id`, `modifier_id`, `create_time`, `modify_time`, `position`, group_id, f_get_app_cate_name (group_id), `group_sort` FROM home_recommend_hot WHERE dealer_id =#{dealerId} AND state = 1 ORDER BY group_sort ASC

SELECT ai.`name` AS appName, ai.icon AS appIcon, apt. NAME AS typeName, apt.unit AS typeUnit, dapi.price, dapi.pay_price, dapi.discount FROM app_price_type apt LEFT JOIN dealer_app_price_info dapi ON apt.id = dapi.apt_id AND dapi.ai_id = apt.ai_id LEFT JOIN app_info ai ON apt.ai_id = ai.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND dapi.dealer_id =#{dealerId} AND dapi.ai_id =#{goId} AND dapi. STATUS = 1 LIMIT 1
